comments:

Using TestAttr1.wsdl from the nil & attribute test case
Create Dynamic Web Project
Import TestAttr1.wsdl into WebContent folder
Create top-down web service from .wsdl file
Click finish in Wizard -->

On 0.7 WTP driver I am not seeing the exception but when I try to create the 
web service using the wizard the workbench hangs there at the "Parsing..." step 
noted in the progress message area.  I have to use Task Manager to kill the 
workbench.

The following comment was made by Kathy Chan on behalf of Chris Brealey:

I tried the scenario with WTP 0.7 and I could not reproduce the problem.  
The "parsing WSDL" finished in reasonable time without hanging.  Please provide 
more detail instruction if you are able to reproduce this consistently.
